title: Welcome to My Blog
description:
Welcome to our new blog, My Blog. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!

title: Distill codes
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing,
native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.
#for creating Distill post: in the console down below, write
distill::creat_post(“title the post”), then the content here.
